channel.title: [317] Spirit-Pkz Progress Report #1
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/rlgc2s.jpg[/img][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/29cwfiu.jpg[/img][/center]
Hey guys I am making a server Called spirit-Pkz I released on mopars forums but got deleted so I am re-making the server. I have currently got all godsword specials working, all ancients working, all lunar working, rushing working, ice barrage freezing working, dragon claws special working, saradomin sword special working, range following, propper barrows stance, attacking, running, block & walking, full pvp armour vesta, statius, morrigan, zuriel,full dagon'hai , all spirit shields, equipment interface & alot more.
[size=28pt]Pictures[/size]
[size=18pt]Godsword Specials[/size] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2hqyn8j.jpg[/img][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ijqe84.jpg[/img][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/sp9j7t.jpg[/img][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/aerubc.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Dragon Claws & Saradomin Sword Special[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2q36u54.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1zoc0w3.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Anchor --==No Special Yet==--[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hq80sm.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Ancients Barraging[/size]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2wegj7q.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5ygokg.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2952xrk.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/i5stg2.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Dagon'hai Robes[/size]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2hrl7jn.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Vesta[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ep51cy.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21eser.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Statius[/size]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6fvb45.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Morrigans[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/69pa4y.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w6xlk4.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Zuriels[/size]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2u6d1ls.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Spirit Shields[/size]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/v5ft75.jpg[/img]
I will be adding home, shops, training, donator zone, pk box, staff zone & alot more locations. I need to do alot of work I'll be posting updates every week to show you guys how the server is going.
